mapper.sql: id, name, place_origin, contact_name, mobile_phone, legal_person, registered_capital, registration_number, unionPay_number, bank_number, bank_account, account_opening_branch, account_name, account, del_flag, enable, create_time, manufacturer_code, create_by, update_time, update_by
mapper.select:
select
from manufacturer WHERE del_flag = 0
AND manufacturer_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{manufacturerCode},'%'))
AND name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
AND enable = #{enable}
and company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by create_time desc
